title: Backend: Organization Model & Migration
description: Create Organization model in `app/organizations/models.py` and generate Alembic migration.

title: Backend: Organization Service & API
description: Implement CRUD logic in `service.py` and endpoints in `router.py`. Register router in `main.py`.

title: Frontend: Organization Types & API Hooks
description: Define TypeScript interfaces and React Query hooks for organization management.

title: Frontend: Organization List & Management UI
description: Create Organization List page (for Super Admins) and Edit/Create forms.
